1.0.name: wordpress/custom-post-type-search
1.0.description:
Description

Search into your custom post type, taxonomies and metadata.

How to use

  1. Include the code require_once(WP_CONTENT_DIR.'/custom-post-type-search.php'); customPostType::searchForm(); in your single or page template.

Please Vote and Enjoy

Your votes really make a difference! Thanks.
